ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands

Class RotateCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands.ShipCommand
      • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands.RotateCommand

  • public class RotateCommand
extends ShipCommand
    A command to cause a ship to rotate. Positive rotations are counter-clockwise; negative rotations are clockwise

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RotateCommand(double degrees)
      Creates a command to rotate a ship.
